name: Trine 4: Melody of Mystery
descr: 关于此内容In Trine 4: Melody of Mystery, there's trouble brewing at the Astral Academy once again. All the students are cursed, trapped in enchanted slumber and unable to wake up. With a mysterious spirit on the loose, released accidentally by the kind and guileless Cornelius Crownsteed, it's best to call the Heroes of Trine to see what they can do to bring back Cornelius and his fellow students from their enticing dreamlands.Trine 4: Melody of Mystery is a 6-level story campaign that continues the travels of Amadeus, Pontius, and Zoya. The new adventure features more upgrades for the heroes' skills, and fresh puzzles with clever gameplay elements for our heroes to take on.Features6 all-new and exciting levels set in strange and unpredictable dream worldsNew music tracks to accompany the levels and storyFull voice acting and localizationsNew upgrades for the heroes' skills: Freezing Blink, Explosive Objects, Ricochet Arrows, Hazard Trail, Leaping Lightning, and Charged Dream ShieldNew gameplay with ice, torches, magnets and crystalsThe story of Trine 4: Melody of MysteryMelody is a spirit who lives inside an enchanted music box, possessing the ability to see people’s deepest and most secret wishes. With her talents, she can make them come true in the dream worlds she conjures.When Cornelius, a student of the Astral Academy, stumbles upon Melody’s music box and opens it, he unleashes Melody, who decides to create fantastic new dreams for all the Academy's students. Luckily one student is able to escape the curse and summon the Heroes of Trine to set things right.The heroes must traverse the dreamscapes of the Astral Academy, lush and verdant pirate adventures, face the night on the icy cold tundra, follow a sinister path through a haunted old forest, survive in the surreal world inside the clockwork mind of a mechanical owl, and finally solve all mysteries at the deceivingly cosy homestead of Cornelius Crownsteed.Familiar faces from Nine ParchmentsIn addition to the familiar faces of Heroes of Trine, Melody of Mystery reintroduces many fan favorites from Nine Parchments, a Trine universe spin-off story that focused on Astral Academy students. Cornelius is not the only student under Melody's spell - Carabel, Gislan, Rudolfus and Owl are all dreaming of enchanted fantasies.
